title: Black Screen After Match Completion

embed.description: Years of conversation fill a tonne of digital pages, and we've kept all of it accessible to browse or copy over. Whether you're looking for reveal articles for older champions, or the first time that Rammus rolled into an "OK" thread, or anything in between, you can find it here.

body: Not sure if I should put this in report a bug boards because I am not sure it's a gameplay bug. For the past few days, randomly when a match completes, I get a black screen and cannot access my computer. My mouse still shows but it is all black. I don't have league blocked on a firewall, and everything always works fine. I did just buy a 25 foot cat-6 ethernet cord so I could get off wireless. I also use Lolwiz, which is the only other thing I think could be causing it. I did find an old post with a similar problem but I did not see any solution. Does anyone else have this issue or know how to fix it?

replies.body:
Third-party programs have a tendency of causing issues throughout the game loop. I recommend disabling LolWiz or [completing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if the issue changes at all.

Let me know if either of those caused any changes.

I uninstalled overwolf(lolwiz) all together, did a clean boot, and repaired league client. It just happened again. I have a republic of gamers laptop G750JW 8GB ram, ethernet connection, why is this happening.

When you see the black screen, is it just for League or your entire computer? Additionally, when you're unable to load in o the match, do you see any error messages or just a black screen until you close League out?

I had the same exact issue! It would happened to me right after i hit "continue" after the end of every match.

Something that would sometimes (rarely) work for me would be to hit continue and IMMEDIATELY hit alt+tab right after, before the black screen appeared. The ONLY way i could get rid of the black screen and go back to desktop was to close my laptop and open it back up. 

I didn't have any third-party apps and i never have so idk if thats actually the issue. I also tried to reinstall league but it didn't work. I had this problem for a while up until a few patches ago and it went away on its own. 

Lastly, i dont know if this helps but i did update my drivers shortly before this issue occurred and for some reason my League of Legends icon on my desktop showed up as a blank page icon around the time that the black screen bug occurred. It still shows up as a blank page icon to this day instead of the regular League icon.
all I can see is the cursor, although randomly clicking doesn't do anything either.

It's a black screen for the entire computer. I tried alt+tab, ctrl+alt+delete, hitting shift 5 times to bring up sticky keys, nothing works. It does it no other times except going to stats until I restart. No error messages come up.

Gotcha. I think this may be related to either a problem with League's permissions or a hard drive error. To investigate, I suggest taking a look at the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), which covers these possibilities. 

Let me know if these steps caused any change.

I have had this same probelm for a while now and I followed various peoples suggestions (WIndows 7 compatibility mode, permissions, running as an admin) and nothing had changed UNTIL I changed my video mode from "Fullscreen" to "WIndowed" - now i Have no issue but I would like to not play in Windowed mode.

Update: I always run as administrator so I don't believe its the permissions. I seldom randomly get the black screen now, although it still occurs.  I have avg, which has little pop ups in the corner from time to time. There is an option in avg, which prevents notifications during a full screen app i believe game mode. When you finish a game, and avg decides to give you an offer it must conflict or something and goes to the black screen.  I set the maximum frequency of in-app offers to 3 a day which is the lowest you can go before buying. I definitely can tell that the black screens don't come as often!
I was able to only play one match, but I did a repair and closed the lolwiz app. I had no issues, I will post again if it still happens.
Hey just wondering if your issue stopped or has it persisted? Were you able to find the solution to your problem?

Hello,
Could you try to disable Lolwiz and then try and see if the error persists?
Also after the game completes don't press anything and just wait for the black screen to get away and then tell us how many seconds/minutes did it take.
Try what i said and report back.
